body.p: Davis had been appointed constable in the Jeffersontown District, and thereby vacated his office of Justice. I think I omitted to mention this when I wrote to you before
I however now send his resignation Please send commission to A. G. Watts care County Clerk, Louisville

Very Resly
Morton Monroe
Gov Bramlette.
Here's to a restored Union!!!

Justice Peace
Jefferson Co
Resignation
Accepted &
A. G. Watts
apptd
12th April/65
